remarks: Like ~ dvelimf but with a distinct variable constraint on ` x ` and ` z ` .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 6-Mar-2018.)
statement:
dvelimfv.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
dvelimfv.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. z ps ) $.
dvelimfv.3 $e |- ( z = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
dvelimfv $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( ps -> A. x ps ) ) $.
$d x z $.
